posts.post_content: Anyone got a lower grade Hindu back for sale?  I'm looking for a 1.5 grade, don't want one graded poor.  Looking to spend up to $175.00 if someone has a 2 at that price range obviously I would be very interested but I'm guessing not one out there at $175.  I've seen several 1.5's sell for $150 - $190.  So hit me up if anyone wants a quick, easy transaction.  Thanks!!
